name: Corn Cannon
description:
The Ludum Dare Page for this game

Harvest as much corn as you can with 20 cannon balls in Corn Cannon!

(Can you find the secret ending?)

Controls

WASD - Move and aim the cannon

Press Space - Charge the cannon

Release Space - Fire the cannon

Tools: Unity, Blender, Inkscape
